help.title: FlashBot Help Page

commands.name: commands
commands.desc: commands you want to see its help message

help.sentToDM: Sent the help messages to your DM.
help.footer: Use the emojis to flip the page. / Time limit: 30 seconds / Version: %1$s

serverinfo.run:
Server Name: **%s**
Members in the Server: %s
serverinfo.title: Server Information of %1$s
serverinfo.name: Server name

page.2: Informations related to this server (Page 2 of 2)

eval.desc: Evaluates JS code. Needs Administrator permission to use this.
eval.title: Eval

reload.error: An error occured while reloading the command: %1$s

say.noEveryone: The bot cannot say to `@everyone` or `@here`.

locale.noLanguage: The language you entered does not exist.
locale.DESC: See or change the bot locale on the server.
locale.noPermission: You don't have `%1$s` permission to do that.

activate.title: Activate **FlashBot**
activate.confirm: React with :white_check_mark: or type `Yes` to agree, otherwise react with :x: or type `No` to deny.
activate.agree: Thank you! You agreed with our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy. The Bot is now activated on this server.
activate.reactFail:
The Bot does not have `%1$s` permission, so the bot could not add reaction.
Please enter response via text, or add reaction manually.
activate.content:
You need to agree to the FlashBot's **Terms of Service** and **Privacy Policy**.
You can see them in the link below.
Terms of Service: https://flashbot.ga/tos
Privacy Policy: https://flashbot.ga/privacy
activate.DESC: Activate this bot on the server

deactivate.title: Deactivate **FlashBot**
deactivate.content:
You're now going to disable **FlashBot** on this server.
When deactivated, the bot will not respond any commands except `activate`.
The data for this server will be stored after you deactivated the bot.
deactivate.confirm: React with :white_check_mark: or type `Yes` to confirm deactivation, otherwise react with :x: or type `No` to cancel.
deactivate.agree: Thank you for using our bot. The bot is now disabled in this server. To reactivate, use the `activate` command.
deactivate.reactFail:
The Bot does not have `%1$s` permission, so the bot could not add reaction.
Please enter response via text, or add reaction manually.
deactivate.DESC: Deactivate this bot on the server

load.error: An Error occured when loading the command: %1$s
load.alreadyExists: That command (or aliases in it) already exists.

unload.error: An Error occured while unloading the command: %1$s

member.NAME: member
member.DESC: The member to see the profile image. Currently, only mentions are accepted.

name.NAME: name
name.DESC: The name of the data to purge cache. (guild / user)

savenow.DESC: Saves the json database file now.

support.text: Enter the Support server and chat, ask, or get support.
support.DESC: Gives the link to the support server.

cmd.NAME: command
cmd.DESC: The command to run on the shell.

CommandHandler.unexpectedError:
An unexpected error occured. Please report this error message and the Error ID to the Support server.
Error message: ```
%1$s
```
Error ID: `%2$s`

run.ownerOnly: Only the owners of the bot can run this command.

CommandHandler.noUserPermission: You need to have `%1$s` permissions to use this command.

ClientError.error:
An Error occured. Please report this error message and the Error ID to the Support server.
Error message: ```
%1$s
```
Error ID: `%2$s`

pleaseRegister.guild: You need to register this server in order to use this feature. Please register using the `%1$sactivate` command.

error.DBNotReady:
This feature needs the database storage, but the bot is not connected to the storage.
Please report this to the Support server to be fixed.
